selections.name: Majestic Delight
selections.reason: Consistent performer in this grade with a 5th, 9th, 3rd, and 2nd in recent starts. Drawn perfectly in barrier 2 to get a soft run.

selections.name: Come Fast Fay Fay
selections.reason: Ran a solid 3rd last start in this class. Good draw allows him to settle closer to the speed.

selections.name: Sparkle And Gold
selections.reason: Drops into Class 5 (Rst40-0) which is a significant easing of competition. Carries weight but has the class edge.

selections.name: Noble Deluxe
selections.reason: Last start winner on the All Weather. Confidence is high, though switching back to turf is a query.

danger_horse.name: Come Fast Fay Fay
danger_horse.reason: Knocking on the door and maps well.

exotic_strategy.strategy: Win Bet #8; Exacta Box 2, 8; Trifecta 1, 2, 8 Box

selections.name: Prestige Hall
selections.reason: Excellent effort last start finishing 2nd, beaten less than a length. Trending in the right direction.

selections.name: Hayday
selections.reason: Consistent type who ran 3rd last start at Happy Valley. Drawn well to be competitive again.

selections.name: Yee Cheong Glory
selections.reason: Solid 3rd last start. Maps to get a good run from barrier 5.

selections.name: Sea Sapphire
selections.reason: Ran 2nd two starts back. Can bounce back from a midfield finish last time.

danger_horse.name: Hayday
danger_horse.reason: Top weight but has the class to feature.

selections.name: Better And Better
selections.reason: Showed improvement last start finishing 4th. Light weight gives him a distinct advantage late.

selections.name: Bucephalas
selections.reason: Won three starts back. Form is mixed but has the ability to win in this grade if he overcomes the draw.

selections.name: Forever Folks
selections.reason: Last start winner on the AWT. Needs to transfer that form to turf but confidence is high.

selections.name: Glorious Success
selections.reason: Drawn the rail and has been running respectable races. Place chance.

selections.name: Good Luck Happy
selections.reason: Strong 2nd last start, beaten just over a length. Zac Purton rides, which is a massive plus.

selections.name: Elite Golf
selections.reason: Last start winner. Has to overcome top weight and a wide barrier, but form is hard to knock.

selections.name: Master Phoenix
selections.reason: Ran 2nd two starts back. Consistent type who should be in the mix.

selections.name: So My Folks
selections.reason: Light weight contender who could sneak into the placings.

danger_horse.name: Elite Golf
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is the best form, despite the draw.

selections.name: Crossborderdude
selections.reason: Last start winner at this track/distance. Drawn perfectly in barrier 3. The one to beat.

selections.name: Thunder Prince
selections.reason: Solid 3rd last start. Consistent performer who rarely runs a bad race.

selections.name: Jubilant Winner
selections.reason: Ran 4th last start and gets the rail draw. Light weight helps.

selections.name: Sunny Q
selections.reason: 5th last start. Has ability but the wide draw makes it tougher.

selections.name: Beauty Eternal
selections.reason: Ran 5th in the Classic Mile, which is superior form for this handicap. Looks well placed here.

selections.name: Top Dragon
selections.reason: Also comes out of the Classic Mile (5th). Drawn the rail and carries a light weight.

selections.name: Soleil Fighter
selections.reason: Consistent runner coming off a 2nd place finish. Drawn well.

selections.name: Encountered
selections.reason: Class runner but carries top weight. 3rd in G3 last start commands respect.

selections.name: Aeroinvincible
selections.reason: Narrowly beaten 2nd last start. Drawn perfectly in barrier 2 to go one better.

selections.name: Gallant Epoch
selections.reason: 2nd last start and a winner prior. In peak form.

selections.name: Amazing Fun
selections.reason: Ran 2nd last start. Racing well and stays down in the weights.

selections.name: Good Luck Babe
selections.reason: Consistent type, 5th last start. Good draw keeps him in the hunt.

selections.name: Happy Index
selections.reason: Last start winner. Zac Purton retains the ride. Hard to go past.

selections.name: Together We Value
selections.reason: Improved effort to finish 2nd last start. Looks the main danger.

selections.name: The Unique Star
selections.reason: Also coming off a 2nd place finish. Wide barrier is the only negative.

selections.name: Jumbo Treasure
selections.reason: Forgive last run (wide). Won the start prior. Can bounce back.

selections.name: Prestige Good
selections.reason: Ran 2nd in a Class 2 race last start. Drops to Class 3 here. Massive class edge.

selections.name: Gentlemen Legacy
selections.reason: Consistent performer, 3rd last start. Solid place chance again.

selections.name: Liveandletlive
selections.reason: Narrow 2nd last start. In good form and drawn well.

selections.name: The Auspicious
selections.reason: 4th last start. Racing consistently.

selections.name: Helene Supafeeling
selections.reason: Last start winner. Drawn the rail (1) to dictate or box seat. Hard to beat.

selections.name: Glowing Praises
selections.reason: Also a last start winner. Form is strong, just needs luck from the draw.

selections.name: Hot Delight
selections.reason: Won maiden last start. Steps up but carries light weight.

selections.name: Armour War Eagle
selections.reason: 2nd last start on AWT. Good draw.

selections.name: Positive Smile
selections.reason: Won last start by nearly a length. Light weight and good draw make him the one to catch.

selections.name: Super Express
selections.reason: Last start winner. Maps well from barrier 4 to challenge again.

selections.name: Aurio
selections.reason: 2nd last start. Consistent type who draws perfectly.

selections.name: Sunny Da Best
selections.reason: 3rd last start. Racing well.
